name: Pivot (Malediktus, franchioping, io_roboto, ByteTale Studios, Alios)
name_original: Pivot (Malediktus, franchioping, io_roboto, ByteTale Studios, Alios)
description:
Make the best of your fate in this arena wave shooter. Use a set of dice to choose to strengthen yourself or to weaken your enemies.
